functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Ixinik Library Key - Casting Section\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Casting, the art of mainpulating","color":"gray"}','{"text":"energy outside the body, is a well","color":"gray"}','{"text":"practiced and researched science","color":"gray"}','{"text":"taught throughout the world.","color":"gray"}']}}
